OrgName: ACCESS Litigation, an Edmond Scientific Company
activities:
ACCESS Litigation Support Services, LLC provides data processing, hosting, and collection services for electronically stored information.  These services are performed on behalf of both individual and corporate clients and/or their legal counsel in the process of conducting data auditing, electronic discovery, and/or other related consulting services.
Personal information is collected in the EU by the Client directly or by ACCESS personnel and/or partners at the Client's direction.  In addition, data might also be sent to ACCESS in the United States by the Client or an ACCESS partner for processing.  Data is then housed on secure servers in the United States which only ACCESS personnel who have a need to access such information for the purpose of performing the necessary data services may access.
contactoff1: ACCESS Litigation, an Edmond Scientific Company
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All complaintants are encouraged to refer privacy issue to ACCESS' CEO, Daniel Waldschmidt (daniel@accesslitigation.com) for expedited resolution. If the issue cannot be resolved to that individual's satisfaction
